Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ActivateProduction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ActivateProduction
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractTurnPhase
public class ActivateProduction
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractTurnPhase
This class represents activate production action with all the method necessary to perform it.

  • Method Details

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(Turn turn, ActivateProductionMessage activateProductionMessage) throws InvalidActionException, PaymentErrorException, NotEnoughResourcesException, ResourceMismatchException
      Performs an activate production action. In the first place, it checks if the player has enough resources to do the action, then it takes resources from player warehouse and it puts resulting resources in the strongbox. It doesn't expect any exception like: DepotOutOfBoundsException, DepotNotFoundException or StrongboxOutOfBoundException because the action requires several checks done before retrieving resources from warehouse.
      Specified by:
      activateProduction in interface AbstractTurnPhase
      Parameters:
      turn - turn in which the action has to be performed.
      activateProductionMessage - message containing instruction on how to do the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException
      PaymentErrorException
      NotEnoughResourcesException
      ResourceMismatchException

    • calculateResources

      private void calculateResources​(Turn turn, ActiveProductions requestedProductions)
      Calculate the cost of all required productions.
      Parameters:
      requestedProductions - kind of productions required by player.

    • performExtraProductionEffect

      private void performExtraProductionEffect​(Turn turn, ActiveProductions requestedProductions)
      Adds to input and output resources occurrences of resources coming from an extra production effect
